Aji Santoso Melihat Aura Positif dalam Diri Pemain Persebaya
01 Nov 2019, 19:16 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pelatih Persebaya Surabaya, Aji Santoso mulai melihat aura positif dalam timnya setelah dua kali memimpin latihan. Aji mengatakan bahwa anak asuhnya cukup antusias melahap semua program latihan yang diberikan.
Persebaya kembali menggelar latihan di lapangan Mapolda Jawa Timur, Jumat (01/11/2019). Itu menjadi latihan kedua bagi Aji setelah ditunjuk sebagai pengganti Wolfgang Pikal.
"Kami baru latihan dua hari ini, tapi saya lihat ada satu aura yang sangat positif pada pemain," kata Aji Santoso usai latihan.
Menurut arsitek asal Kepanjen, Kabupaten Malang tersebut, kondisi seperti itu yang sangat diharapkan. Karena kata dia Persebaya punya gaya permainan yang agresif.
"Ini yang coba saya kembalikan, karena Persebaya itu cara mainnya dari segi mental adalah agresif, tidak kenal lelah, ngeyel dan ngotot," imbuhnya
"Dari segi taktik adalah aliran bola-bola bawah, ini yang akan saya padukan mentality dan taktikal," tegas mantan arsitek Persela Lamongan itu.

Aji Santoso Sees Positive Aura in Persebaya Players
Nov 01 2019, 19:16 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persebaya Surabaya coach, Aji Santoso began to see a positive aura in his team after twice leading training. Aji said that his foster children were enthusiastic enough to devour all the training programs provided.
Persebaya again held an exercise at the East Java Regional Police Headquarters on Friday (01/11/2019). It was Aji's second training after being appointed as Wolfgang Pikal's successor.
"We have only been training for two days, but I see that there is a very positive aura in the players," Aji Santoso said after training.
According to the architect from Kepanjen, Malang Regency, such conditions are to be expected. Because he said Persebaya has an aggressive style of play.
"This is what I am trying to return, because Persebaya is the way to play from a mental perspective is aggressive, tireless, nagging and persistent," he added
"In terms of tactics is the flow of the balls down, this is what I will combine mentality and tactics," said the former architect of Persela Lamongan.
